title: Andrei Stoica
text:
Github
  
  
    
     LinkedIn
  

      

Education
Master of Science - Computer Science | 2022  Ontario Tech University | Oshawa, ON
Bachelor of Science - Computer Science | 2018  Ontario Tech University | Oshawa, ON


    
  



Work Experience
Data Engineer (contract) | Aug. 2022 - April 2023  The Block Crypto | Remote

Build and maintain data pipelines to aid the research team in better making sense of the crypto landscape
Collaborate with research and engineering teams to ensure data quality and stability of pipelines
Technologies : Python · Pandas · SQL · Apache Airflow · Amazon Web Services (AWS) · Redshift

Graduate Research Assistant | May 2018 - Aug. 2020  Ontario Tech University, Oshawa, ON

Lead the research on text mining and natural language processing queries in relational databases
Topics and Technologies used : PostgreSQL · topic modelling · NLP · Python web services



Project Experience
NLP Relational Queries And Its Applications (2020) Thesis Project

Stoica, Andrei, Ken Q Pu, and Heidar Davoudi. 2020. “NLP Relational Queries and Its Application.” In 2020 IEEE 21st International Conference on Information Reuse and Integration for Data Science (IRI), 395–98. IEEE.

Developed LDA extension to PostgreSQL to allow Topic Modelling of text columns inside of SQL
Created a web front end to visualize the change in topics over time for academic authors and venues
Published 2020 IEEE International Conference on Information Reuse and Integration for Data Science
Technologies : Python · SQL/PostgreSQL · Flask · HTML · CSS · D3.js

Scalable Analysis of Open Data Graphs (2019)

Stoica, Andrei, Michael Valdron, and Ken Pu. 2019. “Scalable Analysis of Open Data Graphs.” In 2019 IEEE 20th International Conference on Information Reuse and Integration for Data Science (IRI), 334–41. IEEE.

Performed analysis of similarities between documents through Canada’s Open Data portal
Provided insight into organization and connectedness of Canada’s Open Data
Scalable and Distributed code base to allow for large dataset and scaling with time
Published and Presented at 2019 IEEE International Conference on Information Reuse and Integration for Data Science
Technologies : Python · SQL/PostgreSQL · Apache · Spark/PySpark · Matplotlib · GCP Storage · GCP Dataproc

Canadian Political Twitter Analysis

Built tools to track and analyse the conversation surrounding Canadian politics on Twitter
Tracked key figures and CDNPoli hashtag and predicted standings in 2019 election
Technologies : Python · Tensorflow · SQL/PostgreSQL · Matplotlib
